Class Assertions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raistlic.common.assertion.Assertions

  • public final class Assertions
extends java.lang.Object
    Static factory methods holder, the entry point of the package.

      • createDefaultExpectedCases

        public static AssertionFactory createDefaultExpectedCases(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> exceptionMapper)
        Creates and returns a new instance of AssertionFactory with the specified exception mapper.
        Parameters:
        exceptionMapper - the exception mapper to use, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        the created AssertionFactory instance.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when exceptionMapper is null.

      • createThreadLocalExpectedCases

        public static AssertionFactory createThreadLocalExpectedCases(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> exceptionMapper)
        Creates and returns a new instance of AssertionFactory with the specified exception mapper, which reuses thread local expectation instances on invocation.
        Parameters:
        exceptionMapper - the exception mapper that creates proper exception with message when needed.
        Returns:
        the created AssertionFactory instance.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when exceptionMapper is null.
